alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:00PM CDT until June 26 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN YAZOO AND MADISON COUNTIES... At 1000 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Renfroe to near Camden to near Benton, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Renfroe and Singleton around 1005 PM CDT. Farmhaven, Edinburg and Sharon around 1010 PM CDT. Standing Pine around 1020 PM CDT. Madden around 1025 PM CDT. Walnut Grove around 1030 PM CDT. Canton around 1035 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
